General.Name: The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited
General.Description: The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company offers fire, marine and transportation, motor, property, and miscellaneous insurance products. It offers its products through 24 branches. The company was formerly known as Luang Lee Insurance Company Limited and changed its name to The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited in 1985. The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1933 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
